Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PySCUMM is a module package to develop graphical adventures similar to the made
with SCUMM 8.1.0, with this version LucasArts produced games titles like 'The
Curse of Monkey Island'.

PySCUMM use PyGame framework (SDL).

PySCUMM is multiplatform, easy and fast! :)
info.keywords: scumm, game, pygame, python, pyscumm, point & click
info.name: pyscumm
info.platform: GNU/Linux, Windows, MacOS and any platform when Python and Pygame can be run.
info.summary: A SCUMM based engine for Python
info.html_description:
PySCUMM is a module package to develop graphical adventures similar to the made with SCUMM 8.1.0, with this version LucasArts produced games titles like ‘The Curse of Monkey Island’.

PySCUMM use PyGame framework (SDL).

PySCUMM is multiplatform, easy and fast! :)
